paramInformation.label: Pulse factor
paramInformation.description: Impulse or Rotation factor (see NorthQ docs for Gas meters)

paramInformation.label: IR Listen period
paramInformation.description: Additional time for feedback measurement. Should always be 0.

paramInformation.label: IR Pulse Width
paramInformation.description: Adjusts transmit signal so received signal will in average be equal to this values.

paramInformation.label: Poll / Wake up frequency
paramInformation.description: Wake device up this many times per second. This value also controls number of measurements per second on mechanical meters

paramInformation.label: Pulse Threshold Low
paramInformation.description: Low detection threshold for wheel meters

paramInformation.label: Pulse Threshold High
paramInformation.description: High detection threshold for wheel meters

paramInformation.label: Pulse count
paramInformation.description: Current pulse count in device (pulse count / pulse factor = kWh)

paramInformation.label: Pulse count
paramInformation.description: This register holds the total number of pulses.

paramInformation.label: Keep alive period
paramInformation.description: How many ticks before going back to sleep in normal wakeup mode.

paramInformation.label: Keep alive period
paramInformation.description: How many ticks before going back to sleep in normal wakeup mode.

paramInformation.label: Real-time mode
paramInformation.description: Set this to enter real-time mode from remote. Contains seconds * poll frequency before going back to sleep. If you press the button once this value will be set.

paramInformation.label: Calibration status
paramInformation.description: Aplies to devices with firmware version 3.30 or higher
